comments.body: `isStartingOffsets` here actually means the starting offset of the query, right? We have another concept that is the start offset for current batch (e.g. `isStartingOffsets` in `fetchPartitionOffsets`), do you think it is better to rename this as `isQueryStartingOffsets`?
